quote: Iâ€™ve been using bab.sh for two weeks now, and I really appreciate how easy it was to set up and get started. Everything feels straightforward to understand and use, which made the transition smooth.

I've been using bab.sh for about two months now in my side-projects. It's really simple to install, and the interactive CLI makes running and composing tasks easier than dealing with Makefiles or other similar things. Definitely a super addition to my workflow.
